code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{NavLink,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Menu,X,User,ShoppingCart}from'lucide-react';import Logo from'../../Assets/Images/foodmartlogo.png';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const[isAccountDropdownOpen,setIsAccountDropdownOpen]=useState(false);const toggleMenu=()=>setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen);const toggleAccountDropdown=()=>setIsAccountDropdownOpen(!isAccountDropdownOpen);const navLinks=[{to:'/',label:'Home'},{to:'/about',label:'About'},{to:'/products',label:'Products'},{to:'/contact',label:'Reach Out'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Logo,alt:"Krushivrund Farm Logo",className:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"nav ".concat(isMenuOpen?'nav-open':''),children:navLinks.map(link=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:link.to,className:_ref=>{let{isActive}=_ref;return"nav-link ".concat(isActive?'active-nav-link':'');},onClick:()=>setIsMenuOpen(false),end:link.to==='/',children:link.label},link.to))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-account-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"user-account-btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShoppingCart,{size:24})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/account",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"user-account-btn",onClick:toggleAccountDropdown,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(User,{size:24})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mobile-menu-toggle",onClick:toggleMenu,children:isMenuOpen?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{size:24}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{size:24})})]})]})});}export default Header;
